reviews.headline: Literally unbelievable
reviews.comments:
I've tried dozens and dozens (and dozens) of facial cleansers for my picky skin. I'm very acne prone at 29-years-old. Most cleansers are too mild and cause breakouts or completely strip/dry out my face.
Enter: this cleanser.
I was actually shocked at how soft my face feels. I do notice more even skin tone too, but honestly still just getting over the shock of of how clean and soft I'm left feeling. It's wild to me.
I could see this being too abrasive for sensitive skin as it's a physical exfoliate, but for me this cleanser earned a loyalist.

reviews.headline: love love
reviews.comments: I've been using it for at least a year and continually repurchase. It cleans and exfoliates beautifully without leaving your skin dry or tight.

reviews.headline: Very pleased
reviews.comments: I absolutely love how well this cleanses but isn't rough on my facial skin.

reviews.headline: The Best Cleanser for Combo/Oily/Congested Skin
reviews.comments: Ok people...I've honestly never tried the original formula mentioned in other reviews, but this stuff is amazing! I'm 50 and I have struggled with oily T-zone, acne/cystic acne for years and finally have clear skin! I've tried every cleanser (admitted skin care addiction) and while I thought I found results with other cleansers, it would only be temporary. My 20 year old daughter swears by it! Her skin has cleared and she is able to go foundation free with flawless skin. We've been using for over two years. It has pearlstone that acts as a gentle scrub unclogging pores, leaving your skin soft and smooth. Although its a little pricey, a dime/nickel size amount will clean your entire face and neck, so a tube lasts about 3-4 mos. Love this product!

reviews.headline: Go to cleanser!
reviews.comments: Amazing product, I'm a aesthetician and this is the very few brands that I love using on myself and clients. This cleanser really works and paired with the serum it works wonders! I love it!

faceoff_positive.comments: I swear this product helps with my acne! I started getting cystic acne in my early 20?s and tried all kinds of different cleansers. Some worked for a little bit but most of them left me feeling dry, my acne returned and my texture was awful. I swear this cleanser has helped me with my acne and has slowly been brightening my mild acne marks. The biggest thing I?ve noticed and even my family/friends is the texture of my skin! It?s less stressed, red and more smooth in a sense. It has tiny exfoliants in it but it?s gentle enough to use twice a day. I bought this in January and it?s lasted me until May so it lasts a long time! Highly worth trying!! Please don?t discontinue this!
faceoff_positive.headline: Worked for me!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I am a flight attendant and the purifying face wash was the only one that suited my ever sensitive dehydrated skin I recommended it to all of my colleagues, my skin was so much nicer and dewy no breakouts just a radiant complexion I still have the old face wash, using it very sparsely now because I know there will never be another one in the future!!
